title: Imran Khan survives deadly Pakistan rally shooting
description: Pakistan's former prime minister remains in hospital after the shooting in Wazirabad. Also: Glencore ordered to pay millions over Africa oil bribes, and almost half of UK workers have been mocked for their accents.
itunes:subtitle: His allies claim the attack was an assassination attempt
itunes:summary: Pakistan's former prime minister remains in hospital after the shooting in Wazirabad. Also: Glencore ordered to pay millions over Africa oil bribes, and almost half of UK workers have been mocked for their accents.
itunes:author: BBC World Service
